text: Streptocarpus teitensis, synonym Saintpaulia teitensis, is a species of Streptocarpus in the section Saintpaulia. It is endemic to 1 square kilometer on Mbololo Hill in the Taita Hills of southern Kenya. The total population is estimated at less than 2,500 individual plants in the wild. ==References== * Notes Roy. Bot. Gard. Edinburgh 22: 559 1958. teitensis
title: Streptocarpus teitensis
